long_description: The men's Salomon EXO S-Lab shirt uses tight-fitting, compression fabric to support hard-working muscles so you can run farther and recover more quickly. Synthetic fabric blend specializes in moisture management, moving sweat away from your body and allowing it to evaporate and keep you cool and dry as the pace increases. Flatlock seams reduce chafing. Zipper makes it easy to stay ventilated without overheating, and locking zipper pull won't bounce around while you run. Reflective hits on the men's Salomon EXO S-Lab shirt increase visibility in low light. Close-to-body, skin-tight fit.
short_description: The men's Salomon EXO S-Lab shirt uses tight-fitting, compression fabric to support hard-working muscles so you can run farther and recover more quickly.
